alert.note: Alert for Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:36PM EST until February 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch, with localized amounts near three tenths of an inch expected near Massena, New York. * WHERE...Essex County in Vermont and the Saint Lawrence Valley in northern New York. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest freezing rain will occur between 3 PM and 9 PM this evening. Temperatures are expected to quickly climb above freezing by midnight tonight, ending the threat for ice accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
